subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Mariota, the soft-spoken Oregon quarterback who is a top prospect in the N.F.L. draft, enters this weekend at the combine with an opportunity for teams to inspect and dissect him.
snippet: Mariota, the soft-spoken Oregon quarterback who is a top prospect in the N.F.L. draft, enters this weekend at the combine with an opportunity for teams to inspect and dissect him.
